TextView.android:text:
Real-time customisable charts with over 60 technical indicators, rate alerts, analysis, a full range of order types and more - all delivered in a fully customisable, intuitive, and stable app that lets you trade wherever you go.
Useful Functions: - Powerful advanced charting powered by TradingView
 - Over 60 customisable technical indicators and over 50 advanced drawing tools 
 - Choose from 14 types of chart including candlestick, bar, line, renko and mountain charts
 - Overlay multiple markets on a single chart to identify correlations
 - Easily place trades, view positions and orders on the charts
 - Customisable light and dark themes 

With the app you can trade forex in an easier way!
